vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Sa.26.6 and Zeruiah (H6870);
brother of: Joab (H3097) and Asahel (H6214)
§ Abishai = "my father is Jesse" or "my father is a gift"
grandson of Jesse, nephew of David via his sister Zeruiah, brother of Joab
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Seruiá, hermana de David; guerrero
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞比篩 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "我父是耶西" 或 "我父是禮物"
耶西的孫子, 大衛王的外甥 (大衛的姐姐洗魯雅所生), 約押的兄弟
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚比筛 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "我父是耶西" 或 "我父是礼物"
耶西的孙子, 大卫王的外甥 (大卫的姐姐洗鲁雅所生), 约押的兄弟
